metadata.title: CVE-2017-9871 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The III_i_stereo function in layer3.c in mpglib, as used in libmpgdecoder.a in LAME 3.99.5 and other products, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted audio file.

notes.note: ratliff> reproducer doesn't crash on zesty (no ASAN) no patch available on 2017-06-26

criterions.comment: lame package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
